titleEn: Morgan Stanley's View on DeepSeek: Substituting Computation with Storage, Achieving More with Less
descriptionEn: DeepSeek is rewriting the rules of AI scaling with a "do more with less" philosophy. Morgan Stanley believes that DeepSeek's innovative Engram architecture separates computation from storage through "conditional memory," replacing scarce HBM resources with cost-effective DRAM. This not only redefines the value of ordinary storage but also proves that the key to winning the next phase of AI is no longer brute-force stacking of GPUs, but rather efficient hybrid architectures.
